objects.description: [Dragonfly](https://collaborate.mitre.org/attackics/index.php/Group/G0002) used intermediate targets for watering hole attacks on an intended target. A line of code is injected into the header.php file, this is used to redirect the visitors to an adversary controlled IP.(Citation: CISA Alert (TA17-293A)

external_references.description: ICS-CERT. (2017, October 21). Advanced Persistent Threat Activity Targeting Energy and Other Critical Infrastructure Sectors. Retrieved October 23, 2017.
